    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardPile()
      default constructor initializes an empty ArrayList pile simulating an empty CardPile
      CardPile(ArrayList<Card> cardList)
      initializes the ArrayList pile to the value of the passed ArrayList
      CardPile(Card... cards)
      accepts varargs of type Card and initializes the pile with those cards
      CardPile(CardPile cards)
      copy constructor which initializes a new pile with the same cards in the CardPile passed to the constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToBottom(Card newCard)
      accepts a Card object and adds it to the last index in the pile
      void addToBottom(CardPile cards)
      accepts a CardPile object and adds its Cards to the last index of this pile the card at the bottom of the passed CardPile will be the last card in this pile
      void addToTop(Card newCard)
      accepts a Card object and adds it to the first index in the pile
      void addToTop(CardPile cards)
      accepts a CardPile object and adds its Cards to the first index of this pile the card at the bottom of the passed CardPile will be the top card in this pile
      int cardsLeft() 
      Card getCard(int index)
      accesses the Card in the pile located at index
      ArrayList<Card> getCardlist()
      accessor for the pile ArrayList
      CardPile removeFromBottom(int amt)
      removes amt Cards from the bottom of the pile and individualy adds them to a new CardPile
      CardPile removeFromTop(int amt)
      removes amt Cards from the top of the pile and individualy adds them to a new CardPile

        cards - any number of Cards to be added to the CardPile

        copy constructor which initializes a new pile with the same cards in the CardPile passed to the constructor

      • addToTop

        public void addToTop(CardPile cards)
        accepts a CardPile object and adds its Cards to the first index of this pile the card at the bottom of the passed CardPile will be the top card in this pile
        Parameters:
        cards - pile to be added to the top of the pile

      • addToBottom

        public void addToBottom(Card newCard)
        accepts a Card object and adds it to the last index in the pile
        Parameters:
        newCard - to be added to the bottom of the pile

      • addToBottom

        public void addToBottom(CardPile cards)
        accepts a CardPile object and adds its Cards to the last index of this pile the card at the bottom of the passed CardPile will be the last card in this pile
        Parameters:
        cards - pile to be added to the bottom of the pile

      • removeFromTop

        public CardPile removeFromTop(int amt)
        removes amt Cards from the top of the pile and individualy adds them to a new CardPile
        Parameters:
        amt - a positive non zero amount to remove from the top that doesn't exceed the size of the pile
        Returns:
        the Cards removed from the Pile

      • removeFromBottom

        public CardPile removeFromBottom(int amt)
        removes amt Cards from the bottom of the pile and individualy adds them to a new CardPile
        Parameters:
        amt - a positive non zero amount to remove from the top that doesn't exceed the size of the pile
        Returns:
        the Cards removed from the Pile
